oldentry: Popular explanation: the sun setting and night falling.
verblex: 1. To become darker and darker at the end of the afternoon; to become evening; to become night.
nomlex: 1. The part of each period of twenty-four hours when it is dark outside, especially the time when most people are sleeping. English = night.
2. The time of the day between the end of the afternoon and the time when you go to bed. English = evening.
